text: Does anybody know if there is a way to read “category” field from an RSS feed (in emails)? It seems like even HubSpots own blog RSS feeds category field is omitted

Hello! I'm trying to build a digest email, where I send an email to every contact with 10 records attached. Is there a way to handle this using HubSpot tools? Let's say I want to send a weekly email with 10 best posts from my website

hey <@U01APB2TUDU> you can setup the rss email <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-blog/set-up-an-rss-to-email-blog-subscription-for-an-external-blog|https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-blog/set-up-an-rss-to-email-blog-subscription-for-an-external-blog>
<@UCH1L597V> thank you! In fact I need another type of records to be taken from my DB, any option here?
